text: Laura and Paul are talking. Laura asks Paul where he is, and he replies that he is almost there. Laura asks what she means, and Paul explains that he is close to Macdo. Laura expresses surprise that it is so far, and Paul tells her that it will take about 15 minutes to get there. Laura says she has waited for 30 minutes and that he told her he was almost there 15 minutes ago, and that it is too much. Paul is sorry and says he is. Laura tells him that she is not upset.
